extendedInfo.description: Have you ever read an email or text but don't want to respond right away? And then you worry you'll forget?This widget adds fast access to put reminders about Emails, Texts, Phone Calls, or anything into the notification bar, so you'll never forget to text your friend back!Features:-Customizable background colors to match any theme or rom-Write exactly what you need to remember with the 'Misc' button-Configure the notifications to open a specific app when pressed for even faster access-Persist the notifications so you don't accidentally 'Clear All' and forget them!Access configuration by tapping on 'Don't Forget that...'Misc Button will remember all favorited messages and the latest 10 others.Permissions are for Admob on the configuration screen.

reviews.title: Amazing App
reviews.comment: Just installed this recently and didn\'t realize what I\'d been missing. This widget is very customizable and can actually be used far beyond it\'s advertised use. This widget can remind you to do something with any of your apps, not just e-mails or texts.
